title: Leave busters issue.
body:
I have had internet problems whilst playing.
I dc'd in 2 games, both of which i ended up reconnecting.
Because of these internet problems i have been placed in the lower priority queue twice.
I was wondering if you would be able to fix this issue as i don't want my account to get banned due to my internet playing up occasionally. 
This is really effecting me being able to play with my friends as i now have to wait 10 minutes in the queue.
Hope you can sort it out :)
p.s i have never left a league game, so it kinda sucks being penalised for 'leaving' :/

replies.body:
Oh man, that sounds like it sucks, though I doubt that this has only happened in two games. Leavebuster punishes people who regularly leave games. You may want to avoid public game modes until it's fixed, 'cause right now the servers are fine.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
